Fayetteville.Gully Mill: Gully Mill is a historic grist mill located on the Cape Fear River near Fayetteville, Cumberland County, North Carolina. The mill was built about 1900, and consists of one and two story sections, a large water wheel operated by water flowing through a partially underground flume, and an open rear shed. Also on the property are a miller's house, corrugated metal storage silos, a chicken coop, and miscellaneous related structures.
